Understanding duty of care

Employee safety is a priority for every organization. And it’s up to business leaders to do all they can to create the safest work environment possible.

Why duty of care matters

Any time an employee travels for work, there’s a risk that something could go wrong. As a business leader, it’s your moral and legal obligation to ensure that every employee stays as safe as possible on the road. Take the quiz to assess your organization’s travel risk.

Start the assessment

Safety tips for women travelers

It’s important to understand the customs, culture, and potential risks of a destination. For women, understanding risks and planning ahead is especially important. That’s why we’ve created a four-part series detailing how business travel is different for women, and what can be done to prepare.

Read the blog

Duty of care is too big to tackle alone

Keeping employees safe in a complex world is no small task. To help you fulfill duty of care obligations, SAP Concur products and our App Center partners work together so you can stay connected and alert people quickly in an emergency.

Consolidate travel and itinerary data from any source
